name: harish_release_extension
description: A release task that can be added to a release pipeline.
author: Harish S/O Balamurugan

inputs.name: pre_primary_approvers
inputs.label: Primary Approver
inputs.helpMarkDown: A user / group of users involved in this project

inputs.name: pre_secondary_approvers
inputs.label: Secondary Approver
inputs.helpMarkDown: A user / group of users involved in this project

inputs.name: pre_approval_timeout
inputs.label: Timeout duration
inputs.helpMarkDown: A number, in minutes, to indicate duration in minutes before the secondary approver is allowed to approve this release.

validation.message: Please enter a valid numerical value.

inputs.name: pre_enabled
inputs.label: Enabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, pre-deployment approvals will be enabled

inputs.name: post_primary_approvers
inputs.label: Primary Approver
inputs.helpMarkDown: A user / group of users involved in this project

inputs.name: post_secondary_approvers
inputs.label: Secondary Approver
inputs.helpMarkDown: A user / group of users involved in this project

inputs.name: post_approval_timeout
inputs.label: Timeout duration
inputs.helpMarkDown: A number, in minutes, to indicate duration in minutes before the secondary approver is allowed to approve this release.

validation.message: Please enter a valid numerical value.

inputs.name: post_enabled
inputs.label: Enabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, post-deployment approvals will be enabled
